title: 方块的掉落
author: qweshen
txt_content: 请问如何自定义破坏某方块之后掉落的物品，最好是用指令，谢谢

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
碳=钻石，没毛病hhh
这是1.11的写法，如果是更低版本的请说一声。
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=item] add coal {Item:{id:"minecraft:coal"}}复制代码/scoreboard players tag @e[type=item] add coal {Item:{id:"minecraft:coal_ore"}}复制代码/entitydata @e[tag=coal] {Item:{id:"minecraft:diamond"}}复制代码/scoreboard players tag @e[tag=coal] remove coal复制代码
